reviews.review: I feel this movie capped off everything we seen so far.. it goes the way it must,  but it keeps you on edge until the  last moment.

Avengers Infinity War is everything you'd hope for and beyond. It's relentless , Bold and resonates with our emotions. This is exactly what a film like this should be .This is EPIC <3  this is a fully realized blockbuster film and I am still in awe of how did they manage to do that with all these HEROES. This is every fan's dream and a solid film in its own right because of Thanos ?? goosebumps guaranteed ?? 

PS : Never seen a crowd going crazy like this for a hollywood film before 

#Infinitywar #Avengers #MCU #Thanos #Marvel 
#

Infinity War is really really ridiculously good.  I went in optimistic, but realizing what a huge task it is to work with so many characters.  I can't imagine them doing a better job for the runtime.  Never a dull moment, and I coulda sat another hour.  Can't wait for the follow-up.
Phenomal and heart wrenching. Canâ€™t believe what I just watched.
Pick your greatest movie you have ever seen. Whatever that movie is infinity war WIL blow it away.

Balancing so many characters and significant plot details so masterfully was a sight to be seen.. One of the ballsiest undertakings in cinematic history was implemented with balls of steel.
The story is intimate when it counts, yet epic throughout. The villain has purpose and his motives are well established. Not only is it worth watching, it's a must see!

this is the big kahuna- 10 years' worth of MCU on a collision course.  Thanos is up to evil and this time he's got the Infinity Gauntlet with 2 of the 6 stones already (to start).  Highly entertaining 2.5 hours that will fly by in a heartbeat and you'll LOVE every single second of it ......... until the last second.  After the final easter egg finished (wait for ALL the credits which take 20 minutes at least and makes you realize the scope of this flick) the entire theater seemed to fire up their phones simultaneously, look at each other and say "WTF".  Then you're greeted with a "Thanos will return" message at the last on the screen.  Duh?  Seriously - it's a hugely epic film.  It ties so much together and is just colossal in scope.  It's so well done that I'm going back again to be puzzled again.  Although I'm sure Dr. Strange and his last line have much to do with the next chapter.  And there is a next chapter. Go see it.  In iMAX preferably or at least a great theater with a great screen and sound system.

"In time, you will know what it's like to lose..."
This film really does emphasize on that message, and the portrayal of death in this movie is something that Marvel Studios has never touched upon. Seeing the Avengers dying left and right throughout the film has more of an impact than one might expect. 

It has been said before that the villan Thanos, was designed to be comparable to Darth Vadar from the Star Wars franchise. I believe they have surpassed what Darth Vadar ever was for fans, and Thanos will be remembered as a far more iconic character.  

I think this film has accomplished it's goal, and it has definitely raised the bar for future films in the genre. DC is out of the question, in my opinion.
The culmination of 10 years greatly paying off. The writing, directing and acting exceed expectations. With so many actors on screen, the story flows smoothly and is captivating from start to finish.
Marvel thank you for making this the best movie I have ever seen in my life!
